parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname/IP Address
parameter.description: The host name or IP address of the OpenGarage Web API interface.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of the OpenGarage Web API interface.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The admin password used to access the Web API interface.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.

parameter.name: doorTransitionTimeSeconds
parameter.label: Door Transition Time
parameter.description: Specifies number of seconds that it takes for the garage door to fully open / close, including the time it takes for OpenHab to emit beeps. Round up.

parameter.name: doorOpeningState
parameter.label: Door Opening State
parameter.description: Text state to report when garage is opening

parameter.name: doorOpenState
parameter.label: Door Open State
parameter.description: Text state to report when garage is open (and not in transition)

parameter.name: doorClosingState
parameter.label: Door Closing State
parameter.description: Text state to report when garage is closing

parameter.name: doorClosedState
parameter.label: Door Closed State
parameter.description: Text state to report when garage is closed (and not in transition)
